title: Developing Mathematical Problem-Solving Strategies Using Collaborative Learning Design Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Students design and implement collaborative learning scenarios for mathematical problems in teams, maximizing learning outcomes through iterative feedback.

learning_goals: Students can design three or more collaborative learning scenarios using pattern-based visual tools
Learners can explain mathematical problem-solving strategies with 80% accuracy during online collaborative processes with peers
Teams can apply their designed learning scenarios in practice, conduct formative assessments at least twice, and analyze the results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
